QuestData.Title: Shoak's on the Menu
QuestData.Description:
I don't know what stupid thing Shoak did to get captured by the Natha'vor trolls, we'll find out once you rescue him.
I bet they're getting ready to make a meal out of Shoak. You need to work fast and get him out!
Shoak's one of the largest oafs that I know, those trolls won't be happy that you're taking their "meal" away.
QuestData.LogDescription: Rescue Shoak from the Natha'vor trolls.
